Contact Us
----------

The Town of Double Oak adheres to the Texas DIR policy on the Texas.gov
[domain naming standards](https://dir.texas.gov/technology-policy-and-planning/domain-name-registration?id=7)
. Using the Texas.gov domain name assures our citizens that our domain is an official, trusted Texas municipal/government entity.

### **Electronic Mail (email) Naming Convention**

All Town Administration, Town Council & Police Department Employees email addresses have been migrated to the texas.gov domain naming convention. All personnel can be emailed directly by the following method:
**first\_name.last\_name@doubleoak.texas.gov**
. In an effort to reduce spam, direct email addresses have not been listed.

**Looking for a specific contact form? Follow the buttons below for our others.**

[![Online Open Records Request Form](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/682152fec643c844598dff3f/88df05f3-0e00-4a88-9e07-210e29219872/Online+Open+Request+Form+v3.png)](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/open-records-request-form)
[![Police Contact Form](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/682152fec643c844598dff3f/51a979b8-906f-4925-8349-478fdd0cf1af/Police+Contact+Form+Invert.png)](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/police-contact-form)
[![Contact Court](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/682152fec643c844598dff3f/372b722b-fc58-4ce4-b349-4b08d92fec0e/Contact+Court.png)](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/contact-court)
[![House Watch & Close Patrol Request](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/682152fec643c844598dff3f/c686add9-c21e-4c94-b7b9-2432108e352e/House+Watch+Request.png)](https://doubleoak.texas.gov/house-watch-request)
